ing: 1 (8.4 ounce) can Ocean SprayÂ® Sparkling Juice Drink, any flavor, chilled
des: "Try a refreshing Pink Pineapple Dream from Ocean Spray for a treat you can enjoy all summer long."
ins:
Combine pineapple juice and rum in a tall glass filled with ice.
Pour in Sparkling Juice Drink.
Garnish with pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry, if desired.
